author: abcoathup
content:
Dencun issue tracker: https://notes.ethereum.org/@parithosh/dencun-issue-tracker
Devnet 7 is EIP4844 specific
Devnet 8 should be all Dencun EIPs

author: parithosh
content: In case you want to start testing blob integration, devnet-7 should be enough for you. We have a mostly stable base that's perfect to test tooling integration. If you want to test all EIPs then please wait for devnet-8, date unknown but i'd guess sometime in the next ~2 weeks.
